Package main

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    Interface for use in Observer pattern, requiring all observers (here Players) to have the "update" method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command
    The main.Command class is used to track the commands used to control a given turtle.
    GameBoard
    Tracks parameters and methods related to the size and shape of the gameboard in use.
    GameController
    Provides access to the gameboard and the player list, as well as running general game settings.
    GameObject
    An abstract class for creating objects within the game, like Turtle or Line objects.
    Line
    Object containing methods and data related to the Lines controlled by a player.
    Location
    Location object corresponding to a pair of coordinates and an orientation.
    LocationChange
    A class to store a change in location in both number of steps and degrees to turn.
    Player
    Class for Player data and associated objects.
    PlayerList
    Tracks methods for adding, removing, and accessing Player objects.
    Turtle
    A GameObject which represents a turtle, which will move around using commands stored in a Command object and change location accordingly.
    ViewApplication
    Control the UI elements and Game board.
